mapper.select: select id, status, section, practice_type, course_id, achieve_point, scholarship, late_amt, absent_amt from courses_course_achieve where course_id = #{course_id} order by section, practice_type
mapper.insert: insert into courses_course_achieve( created, modified, status, section, practice_type, course_id, achieve_point, scholarship, late_amt, absent_amt )values( now(), now(), #{status}, #{section}, #{practice_type}, #{course_id}, #{achieve_point}, #{scholarship}, #{late_amt}, #{absent_amt} )
